title: Users should be allowed to sue US tech giants under EU rules, civil groups say - Economic Times
content: Users should be allowed to sue US tech giants under EU rules, civil groups say  Economic Times
description: The call by the coalition of 31 groups and academics comes as EU lawmakers and EU countries thrashed out the final points of the Digital Markets Act (DMA) proposed by EU antitrust chief Margrethe Vestager just over a year ago before it can become law.
